item.description:
If anyone wants to car pool we can decide where to meet.


CHILIFEST

Saturday, July 28, 2007

12:00 PM - 4 PM

Presented by: Hormel Chili

Bring your appetite and sample the best chili prepared by Professional Chili Cooks, Local Restaurants, and Individuals. Pros stir up their best chili recipes to qualify for the World Championship Chili Cook-off, while LocalRestaurants and Individuals compete for bragging rights. Insane Hot Pepper, Chili Dog Eating & Hormel Chili Eating Contests, Live Music, and Children's Entertainment round out the day! This year's Chilifest will benefit the American Red Cross.

2007 ChiliFest Pricing

Admission
Advanced
Online
Door
SkyRide
Online* with purchase of a festival ticket

$6
$7

FREE
FREE


**Admission Price Includes 8 Sampling Tickets**


Order your tickets Online


Enter the Cook-off!


Restaurants, Ametuers, & ICS Members - Click Here!!



ChiliDog Eating Contest - In this "Race Against the Clock" contest 10 Contestants will be selected. Each contestant will recieve 10 Hormel Chili-Dogs. The contestant who can consume the most dogs in 60 seconds will win the competition!!

Hormel Chili Eating Contest - 10 Contestants will be selected. Each contestant will recieve a large bowl of Hormel Chili. The contestant who eats their bowl of Chili the fastest wins!!

Insane Hot Pepper Eating Contest - This competition really "Brings the Heat." Again, 10 Contestants will be selected. In the first round each person will be given a hot pepper. Each contestant must chew and swallow the pepper. Each round is repeated exactly like Round 1. As the rounds go by contestants who can't stand the heat start to drop out. Last man standing wins!!

** All winners will recieve Fabulous Prizes!! **
** Sign-up for the contests right at ChiliFest**
item.name: CHILI FEST
